value.title: Amazon launches AWS instances powered by Habana’s AI accelerator chip
value.excerpt: Amazon has launched new AWS instances powered by Habana's Gaudi, a chip that accelerates the training of AI models.

value.title: AI deployments: Is your organization a transformer, pathseeker, starter or underachiever?
value.excerpt: AI-fueled organizations address strategy, operations, culture and change management and ecosystems, according to Deloitte's latest State of AI in the Enterprise report.

value.title: Salesforce’s Kathy Baxter and Amazon’s Nashlie Sephus talk keeping AI ethical at Enterprise scale
value.excerpt: AI and big data are an important part of most enterprise-scale companies now, but that very scale can make it difficult to employ them safely and ethically. value.title: Speechmatics Launches Autonomous Speech Recognition Software
value.excerpt: Leading speech recognition technology startup Speechmatics has launched its ‘Autonomous Speech Recognition’ software that uses the latest deep learning techniques and breakthrough self-supervised models.

value.title: Infrastructure and data issues hamper companies adopting AI, study finds
value.excerpt: More than three-quarters of companies say that they have AI models that never come into use. For 20% of companies, the numbers look even worse, with only 10% of their models making it into production.

value.title: How machine learning speeds up Power BI reports
value.excerpt: Machine learning delivers insights in Power BI reports—and it enables you to get a large amount of data into your reports to generate those insights more quickly.

value.title: How Instoried Is Using AI To Turn Your Content Into Something People Actually Want To Read

value.title: NTSB head criticizes Tesla's self-driving features, calls them 'misleading'
value.excerpt: NTSB Chairwoman Jennifer Homendy called the company's use of "Full Self-Driving" for its latest driver-assist systems "misleading."

value.title: New VMware CTO Kit Colbert Steers The Company Towards SaaS
value.excerpt: Ranked Industry Analyst Patrick Moorhead dives in as there is a new Chief Technology Officer at VMware. Kit Colbert is thirty days into the role after eighteen years at VMware, where he started as an intern.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Models Predict How the Brain Processes Language
value.excerpt: Neuroscientists find the internal workings of next-word prediction models resemble those of language-processing centers in the brain.

value.title: Why Many People Are Turning Toward Robots And AI To Help Support Their Mental Health And Careers
value.excerpt: I interviewed Yvette Cameron, Oracle Cloud HCM senior vice-president, to learn more about how technology, artificial intelligence and robots can help workers with their mental health matters and careers.

value.title: Teaching robots to think like us: Brain cells, electrical impulses steer robot though maze
value.excerpt: Can intelligence be taught to robots? Advances in physical reservoir computing, a technology that makes sense of brain signals, could contribute to creating artificial intelligence machines that think like us.

value.title: Fintech Mortgage Lender Button Finance Finalizes $2M Seed Round
value.excerpt: Button Finance, Inc., a Fintech mortgage lender focused on home equity, announced that it has finalized a $2 million seed round. The proceeds should allow Button Finance to recruit talent and to further develop its proprietary technology.

value.title: Facebook has language blind spots around the world that allow hate speech to flourish
value.excerpt: Facebook's own researchers have repeatedly warned that the company appears ill-equipped to address issues such as hate speech and misinformation in languages other than English.
